options.name: Venom Extractor
options.description: You gain +1 Resilience. As an action, you you can draw poison from yourself or an adjacent ally, giving them extra mitigation equal to your Resilience bonus modifier against the damage from the poison until it ends.

options.name: Disabling Venom
options.description: Gain +1 Alchemy. Poisons that you craft also cause the affected creature to gain Tier 1 Exhaustion.

options.name: Reaction : Evade
options.description: In response to making a defense check, make an Initiative Check as well and use the higher of the two values

options.name: Free Action : Strike
options.description: You make a quick attack at a creature with a melee weapon with a 1d4 penalty. If the creature is poisoned, the attack has a 1d4 bonus instead.

options.name: Action : Coiled Lunge
options.description: You leap towards a creature within 2 units, making an attack with a melee weapon and adding your initiative bonus to the attack. If your attack misses, you return to your original position, otherwise you remain adjacent to the creature.
